name: Floaroma Town
description: On each side of the Flower Shop.

name: Route 205
description: On the left after exiting Floroma Town.

name: Route 205
description: Need to hop down the ledge midway up route 205 towards Eterna Forest.

name: Eterna Forest
description: Outside the entrance of Eterna. Need HM Cut.

name: Route 205
description: On the right after exiting Eterna Forest to the east.

name: Route 206
description: On the left of Cycling Road southern exit.

name: Route 206
description: Under Cycling Road. Need HM Cut.

name: Route 206
description: North of Oreburgh City.

name: Route 208
description: Next to Berry Master's house.

name: Route 209
description: Across two bridges about halfway through the route.

name: Route 209
description: On the right side just before the second Cycle slide.

name: Solaceon Town
description: Next to PokeMart.

name: Route 210
description: On the right, right outside Solaceon Town.

name: Route 215
description: Halfway through the route, under a wooden bridge. Need HM Cut.

name: Route 215
description: West of Veilstone City's western entrance

name: Route 214
description: South of Veilstone CCity's southern entrance

name: Route 213
description: Next to Pastoria City's Eastern entrance

name: Pastoria City
description: To the right of the house everyone has to go around

name: Route 212
description: Next to Pastoria City's Western entrance

name: Route 212
description: South of Hearthome City, next to the old rich couple.

name: Route 212
description: Coming from hearthome City, past the mansion and across the lake on the left. Need HM Surf.

name: Route 210
description: East of Celestic Town. Need HM Defog

name: Route 211
description: Wast of Celestic Town.

name: Fuego Ironworks
description: To the left of Fugeo Ironworks entrance. Need HM Surf

name: Route 218
description: To the East of Canalave City entrance.

name: Route 222
description: To the East of the Lake Valor.

name: Route 221
description: Slightly to the south of the entrance to Ramanas Park. Need HM Surf.

name: Fight Area
description: To the left of the PokeCentre. Accessible from Snowpoint City after defeating the Elite Four. Must use the boat.

name: Route 230
description: To the East of Fight Area.

name: Route 225
description: To the West of Survival Area. Need HM Cut.

name: Route 226
description: To the East of Survival Area. Use Rock Climb twice to go up the mountain. Need HM Rock Climb.

name: Resort Area
description: Two patches slightly south of the PokeCentre.

name: Route 229
description: Go up the grey path to the right of the PokeCentre.

name: Route 228
description: North of Resort Area. Need to use Bike to go up the mudslide. Can be found on the left next to a house.

name: Route 224
description: Accessible via Victory Road only after defeating Elite Four.
